My first technical post!

Requirement

  • Numpy
  • Keras

1. LeNet

LeNet is the first CNN architecture, developed by Yann LeCun. The architecture of LeNet is showed below:

The CIFAR10 dataset consists of 60000 32x32 image in 10 classes, with 6000 images per class, and there are 50000 training images and 10000 test images.

2. Addition

In addition to LeNet architecture, some additional tricks are added in this implementation:

  • Data preprocessing: x_new = (x - mean) / std
  • Data augmentation: hozirontal flipping and random crops, using ImageDataGenerator in Keras
  • Weight decay: using keras.regularizers.l2

3. Result

import numpy as np
